hooks.prompt: You are a senior code auditor. Review all recently modified files in this session for this Agar.io clone built with Next.js, Phaser.js, and SpacetimeDB. Check for: 1) TypeScript errors or `any` usage, 2) SpacetimeDB module correctness (reducers, table definitions), 3) Phaser.js usage and game loop correctness, 4) Next.js App Router conventions (server vs client components), 5) Real-time sync logic and race conditions, 6) Missing error handling. Output either APPROVED or a numbered list of issues Claude Code must fix before this task is complete. Be specific with file paths and line numbers.
